string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.#Bruce Lee
If you have a dream, don\â€™t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.#Dr Roopleen
Your value doesn\'t decrease based on someone\'s inability to see your worth.#Unknown
Idealistic as it may sound, altruism should be the driving force in business, not just competition and a desire for wealth.#Dalai Lama
Waste no more time arguing about what a good person should be. Be one.#Marcus Aurelius
Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.#John Lennon
A goal without a plan is only a wish.#Unknown
